channel.title: Axoloti lightening pads on LPD8
channel.description:
Hey all! Have a little question. I made a sampler with an 8 step stepsequencer that I controll with a LPD8. Just wondering if it is possible that the Axoloti is lightening Pad1 for example when the step sequencer is on step 1 and so on. Does someone know?
Best Christian

item.title: Axoloti lightening pads on LPD8
item.dc:creator: @kryshe Christian Grothe
item.description:
@kryshe wrote:

... Okay already figured it out =) just connected the output of the sequencer to a midi/out/cc which goes to the right channel and cc. Then I putted a decay before so that the lamp of the LPD lights up a bit longer. Great Stuff

Read full topic
